caption.center: Appeal of David J. BARATI, Intervenor.

opinion.posture: Appeal No. 135 March Term 1974, from the Decree of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County, Family Division, at No. 3426 October Term, 1967; Brosky, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Sidney Baker, Krause Baker, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
J. G. Barati, in pro. per.
opinion.panel: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O'BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX and MANDERINO, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: Decree affirmed. Costs to be borne by appellant.Page 567
